00186   for (i=0; i < Nx; i++){

00193     for (j=0; j < img.nx; j++){

00219               FFTW_FORWARD, FFTW_MEASURE);

00223               FFTW_BACKWARD, FFTW_MEASURE);

00252   a = cblas_dznrm2(Ny, (void*)y0, 1);
00253   sigma = a*pow(10.0,-(snr/20.0))/sqrt(Ny);
00254 
00255     
00256   for (i=0; i < Ny; i++) {
00257       noise[i] = (sopt_ran_gasdev2(seedn) + sopt_ran_gasdev2(seedn)*I)*(sigma/sqrt(2));
00258       y[i] = y0[i] + noise[i];
00259   }
00260 
00261   //Rescaling the measurements
00262 
00263   aux2 = (double)Ny/(double)Nx;
00264 
00265   for (i=0; i < Ny; i++) {
00266     y[i] = y[i]/sqrt(aux2);
00267   }
00268 
00269   for (i=0; i < Nx; i++) {
00270     deconv[i] = deconv[i]/sqrt(aux2);
00271   }
00272   
00273   
00274   // Output image.
00275   img_copy.fov_x = 1.0 / 180.0 * PURIFY_PI;
00276   img_copy.fov_y = 1.0 / 180.0 * PURIFY_PI;

00278   img_copy.ny = param_m1.ny1;

00280   for (i=0; i < Nx; i++){

00282   }
00283   
00284   //Dirty image
00285   printf("Computing dirty image from visibilities \n\n");
00286   purify_measurement_cftadj((void*)xoutc, (void*)y, dataadj);
00287   img_copy.pix = (double*)malloc((Nx) * sizeof(double));
00288   PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(img_copy.pix);
00289 
00290   for (i=0; i < Nx; i++){
00291     img_copy.pix[i] = creal(xoutc[i]);
00292   }
00293   printf("Writing dirty image in fits file\n\n");

00306     param1.ndict = Nb;

00334   for (i=0; i < Nr; i++) {
00335     dummyr[i] = creal(dummyc[i]);
00336   }
00337 
00338   aux1 = purify_utils_maxarray(dummyr, Nr);

00340

00343   img_copy.fov_y = 1.0 / 180.0 * PURIFY_PI;

00349   //Initial solution and weights
00350   for (i=0; i < Nx; i++) {
00351       xoutc[i] = 0.0 + 0.0*I;
00352   }
00353   for (i=0; i < Nr; i++){
00354     w[i] = 1.0;
00355   }
00356   //Copy true image in xout
00357   for (i=0; i < Nx; i++) {
00358     xout[i] = creal(xinc[i]);
00359   }
00360 
00361   
00362   printf("BPSA reconstruction\n\n");
00363   
00364   
00365   //Structure for the L1 solver      
00366   param2.verbose = 2;
00367   param2.max_iter = 100;
00368   param2.gamma = gamma*aux1;
00369   param2.rel_obj = 0.001;
00370   param2.epsilon = sqrt(Ny + 2*sqrt(Ny))*sigma/sqrt(aux2);
00371   param2.epsilon_tol = 0.05;
00372   param2.real_data = 0;
00373   param2.cg_max_iter = 3;
00374   param2.cg_tol = 0.000001;
00375 
00376   
00377   //Initial solution
00378   for (i=0; i < Nx; i++) {
00379       xoutc[i] = 0.0 + 0.0*I;
00380   }
00381  
00382   assert((start = clock())!=-1);
00383   sopt_l1_sdmm((void*)xoutc, Nx,
00384                    &purify_measurement_cftfwd,
00385                    datafwd,
00386                    &purify_measurement_cftadj,
00387                    dataadj,
00388                    &sopt_sara_synthesisop,
00389                    datas,
00390                    &sopt_sara_analysisop,
00391                    datas,
00392                    Nr,
00393                    (void*)y, Ny, w, param2);
00394 
00395   stop = clock();
00396   t = (double) (stop-start)/CLOCKS_PER_SEC;
00397 
00398   printf("Time BPSA reconstruction: %f \n\n", t); 
00399 
00400   
00401     //SNR
00402     for (i=0; i < Nx; i++) {
00403         error[i] = creal(xoutc[i])-xout[i];
00404     }
00405     mse = cblas_dnrm2(Nx, error, 1);
00406     a = cblas_dnrm2(Nx, xout, 1);
00407     snr_out = 20.0*log10(a/mse);
00408     printf("SNR: %f dB\n\n", snr_out);
00409 
00410 
00411 
00412     
00413   for (i=0; i < Nx; i++){
00414     img_copy.pix[i] = creal(xoutc[i]);
00415   }
00416   
00417   printf("Writing reconstructed image in fits file\n\n");
00418   purify_image_writefile(&img_copy, "data/test/test_rec.fits", filetype_img);

00421   printf("SOPT linking test past\n\n");
